posts.author: Mr_Rightside
posts.title: Mike Lee: I attended arguments at the Supreme Court today in Trump v. Slaughter SCOTUS has the chance to overturn *Humphrey’s Executor,* which would restore presidential authority over the executive branch, freeing us from bureaucratic tyranny. This can’t happen a moment too soon.

quotedTweet.content:
Is the headless fourth branch of government constitutional? I say no.

Today, SCOTUS hears arguments in Trump v. Slaughter. The Court will decide the fate of "Humphrey's Executor," a 90-year-old unconstitutional precedent that created that fourth branch.

My Amicus Brief. 🧵

twitter.content:
I attended arguments at the Supreme Court today in Trump v. Slaughter

SCOTUS has the chance to overturn *Humphrey’s Executor,* which would restore presidential authority over the executive branch, freeing us from bureaucratic tyranny 

This can’t happen a moment too soon

posts.author: PiratePatriotParrot
posts.title: Kasmo, a Texas-based IT firm, didn't even bother with the acronym, writing on Glassdoor that "NO US Citizen" was eligible for a job training program.

twitter.content:
Kasmo, a Texas-based IT firm, didn't even bother with the acronym, writing on Glassdoor that "NO US Citizen" was eligible for a job training program.

Kasmo—whose top ranks appear to be composed entirely of Indian nationals—states on its website that "diversity is our strength."

parentTweet.content: One recruiter posted on LinkedIn that an IT job in Chicago was open to almost "any visa" but "no USC," meaning U.S. citizens. The software company Realign posted on Glassdoor that it would not accept "USC" for a six-figure role.

posts.raw_content:
You are a victim: They broke every precedent and law to turn something that wasn't even a "clerical error" into over 60 felony counts... But now that *"your AG"* is in charge, We can't even get closure on people who've already been arrested and died? Much less psychopaths who've gleefully devastated our nation.

You were attacked. You were perp walked around the news cameras; paraded as a circus freak. You were targeted, shot and embarrassed. Your supporters were vilified, attacked, arrested, FIREBOMBED, And not a single thing is being done about it by *"your" AG*

It's because she's not *your AG.* She's Lindsey Graham's AG. She's Turtle Mitch's AG. Thune's AG. she's Joe Biden's AG. She is a stall tactic from the swamp that victimized you. Pam Bondi is a fraud, she will never get anything useful done. because she is a part of our collective humiliation ritual. We want results, You want results. Fire Her. Get a real AG one that makes the RINOs in the swamp sweat. Go scorched earth on them.

FIRE PAM BONDI!
